text: Mauricio Roberto Pochettino Trossero (; born 2 March 1972) is a retired Argentine football player and current manager of the United States men's national team. In 2019, Pochettino led Tottenham Hotspur to the UEFA Champions League Final after beating AFC Ajax in the semi-final for the first time in the team's history.
